title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4082.1 - Distribution schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4082.1 - Distribution schedule

State Regulations

Moneys received by the fund pursuant to sections 251
through 256 of the Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law shall be
distributed annually in accordance with a distribution schedule made available
prior to January 1st of each year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4082.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
